scene_description_enriched: A figure with a golden halo and radiating light, dressed in a pink robe and green mantle, gestures upwards with his right hand and speaks to a group of three bearded men, also with golden halos, who are looking at him with expressions of awe and contemplation. The background is a deep blue, adorned with decorative floral motifs. The figures stand on a reddish-purple ground, suggesting a sacred or elevated space. The scene likely depicts a moment of divine revelation or teaching.
